CSS FLEXBOX GRID

The flexbox grid is built using the lastest spec and is backwards compatible to IE10.

aspect_ratio

Flexgrid offers many options ontop of it just being a standard column grid.

view_column

12 Column by default, but passing in multiple grid values you can extend with ease.

style

Written in BEM

Built with SASS

Maintained with CARE

Grid

The flex grid is built by default as 12 column. To customize the flexgrid, pull down the SASS files and inside _flexgrid.scss change the default variable. Along with the grid, if you need to have several different grids, simply pass in an array of integers. Then using a modifier class you can declare which grid. class="flex flex--10"
